name: tm69
effect: Teaches Rock Polish to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rock Polish to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This can sharply raise the Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This can sharply raise the Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This can sharply raise the Speed stat.
